FuncDef:
The server-port command configures the number of a port to be listened by gRPC IPv4 server during Telemetry dynamic subscription.
The undo server-port command restores the default configuration.
By default, port 57400 is listened by gRPC IPv4 server during Telemetry dynamic subscription.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of a port to be listened.
The value is an integer ranging from 10000 to 57999.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a collector functioning as a client initiates a connection to a device functioning as a IPv4 server, the data sampled is dynamically subscribed to. In this case, you can run the server-port command to configure a server port to be listened. A connection can then be established between the server and client.
